trans-unit.source: Represents a statement that throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 表示擲回例外狀況的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: CodeThrowExceptionStatement can represent a statement that throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: CodeThrowExceptionStatement 可代表擲回例外狀況的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The expression should be, or evaluate to, a reference to an instance of a type that derives from the <xref:System.Exception> class.
trans-unit.target: 運算式應該或評估為衍生自<xref:System.Exception>類別</xref:System.Exception>類型的執行個體的參考

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement.ToThrow%2A> property specifies the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement.ToThrow%2A>屬性會指定要擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement.ToThrow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement"></xref> class with the specified exception type instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeThrowExceptionStatement"></xref>與指定的例外狀況型別執行個體的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，表示擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> representing an instance of the exception to throw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>代表擲回的例外狀況的執行個體。
